compositeStat.name: Might
compositeStat.description: How physically powerful you are. Might primarily increases physical damage you do. It also improves hit chance and block value.

compositeStat.name: Intellect
compositeStat.description: Your comprehension of magic. Intellect increases magic damage and healing that you do, as well as hit chance.

compositeStat.name: Cunning
compositeStat.description: Your ability to outwit your enemies and rivals. Cunning boosts your crit chance and energy pool. It also increases your chance to unlock new constructions and recipes.

compositeStat.name: Swiftness
compositeStat.description: Your speed and dexterity. Swiftness improves your chance to dodge or block attacks, and increases your run speed.

compositeStat.name: Endurance
compositeStat.description: Your ability to withstand damage. Endurance provides armour, magic resistances, extra health, and reduces enemies' crit chance.

compositeStat.name: Courage
compositeStat.description: How eagerly you overcome fear and carry on the fight. Courage replenishes your health and energy over time.
